eventDecorators.name: NewVehicle
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new vehicle is added.

eventDecorators.name: StateChange
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the state of a vehicle changes.

eventDecorators.name: VehicleRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a vehicle is removed.

functionDecorators.name: createVehicle
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new vehicle. The function stores a new Vehicle struct in _vehicles, saves the ID to _vehicleIds and grants the address the VEHICLE role.

parameterDecorators.name: _mileageAtCreation
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle mileage at the time of creation.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleLongitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The longitude of the new vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleLatitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The latitude of the new vehicle.

functionDecorators.name: endRide
functionDecorators.description: Ends a ride with a vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The id of the vehicle to ride with.

parameterDecorators.name: _newVehicleMileage
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle mileage at the end of the ride.

parameterDecorators.name: _newVehicleLongitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The new vehicle longitude.

parameterDecorators.name: _newVehicleLatitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The new vehicle latitude.

parameterDecorators.name: _newStateOfCharge
parameterDecorators.description: - The new state of charge of the vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: - The user of the vehicle.

functionDecorators.name: getFreeVehicles
functionDecorators.description: Gets the id's of all currently free vehicles.

functionDecorators.name: getMyBookedVehicles
functionDecorators.description: Returns the id's of all currently booked vehicles owned by the sender's address.

functionDecorators.name: getMyVehicles
functionDecorators.description: Returns the id's of all vehicles owned by the sender's address.

functionDecorators.name: getVehicleById
functionDecorators.description: Returns the information about a vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle ID.

returnDecorators.description: A dictionary of the current parameters of the vehicle.

functionDecorators.name: getVehicleState
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current state of a vehicle. Can only be done by the vehicle owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle ID.

returnDecorators.description: The current state of the vehicle.

functionDecorators.name: getVehicleUser
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current user of a vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle in question.

returnDecorators.description: The public address of the current vehicle user.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The Id of the vehicle to pause.

parameterDecorators.name: _mileage
parameterDecorators.description: - The current mileage of the vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _longitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The current longitude of the vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _latitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The current latitude of the vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _soc
parameterDecorators.description: - The current state of charge of the vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: - The user of the vehicle.

functionDecorators.name: removeVehicle
functionDecorators.description: Removes a vehicle. Can only be done by the vehicle owner. Removes the entry in the _vehicles mapping and in the _vehicleIds list.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The ID of the vehicle to remove.

functionDecorators.name: reserveVehicle
functionDecorators.description: Sets the msg.sender to the reservant of the vehicle and changes its state.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The Id of the vehicle.

functionDecorators.name: returnCurrentId
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current vehicle ID. Can only be done by the fleet owner.

functionDecorators.name: setVehicleState
functionDecorators.description: Explicitly sets the state of a specific vehicle. Can only be done by the vehicle owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle's ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _newState
parameterDecorators.description: - The new state to set the vehicle in.

functionDecorators.name: startRide
functionDecorators.description: Starts a ride with a vehicle.

parameterDecorators.name: _vehicleId
parameterDecorators.description: - The id of the vehicle to ride with.

parameterDecorators.name: _mileage
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle mileage at the start of the ride.

parameterDecorators.name: _longitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle longitude at the start of the ride.

parameterDecorators.name: _latitude
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle latitude at the start of the ride.

parameterDecorators.name: _soc
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle state of charge at the start of the ride.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: - The vehicle user at the start of the ride.

parameterDecorators.name: _newRide
parameterDecorators.description: - Whether or not a new ride is started (_newRide=true) or an old ride is continued (_newRide=false).
